Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over `styles`, use an enhanced for loop. This simplifies the code and improves readability.

Improvements.Improvement: Reduce method complexity by splitting into smaller methods
Improvements.Description: The `isDisplayed` method has too many responsibilities. It would be more maintainable and testable if you break it down into smaller methods, each with a single responsibility.
